tasks.title: Weight lateral connections by TF-IDF in query expansion
tasks.description: Incorporated TF-IDF weighting into lateral expansion scoring at cortical/query/expansion.py. Added tfidf_weight parameter (default 0.7) to control balance between TF-IDF (distinctive terms) and PageRank (well-connected terms).
tasks.retrospective: Added tfidf_weight parameter to expand_query(). Default 0.7 = 70% TF-IDF + 30% PageRank. Improves query expansion by prioritizing distinctive terms over common ones while preserving connection strength.

tasks.title: Enable code stop word filtering by default in search
tasks.description: Set filter_code_stop_words=True by default in find_documents_for_query() at cortical/query/search.py:54-59. This filters ubiquitous code tokens (def, self, return) from expansion, reducing noise in code search results. Low risk - filtering logic already exists and is tested.

retrospective.notes: Implemented: filter_code_stop_words=True by default in find_documents_for_query and find_passages_for_query

tasks.title: Apply test file penalty by default in search
tasks.description: Detect test files and apply 0.8 penalty in find_documents_for_query() at cortical/query/search.py. Files matching tests/ or test_ pattern should be penalized. Penalty already defined in constants.py. Low risk - easy implementation.

retrospective.notes: Implemented: test_file_penalty=0.8 by default in find_documents_for_query and find_passages_for_query

tasks.title: Add security concept group to code_concepts.py
tasks.description: Added 'security' concept group with 27 terms covering encryption, security primitives, vulnerabilities, access control, and security operations.
tasks.retrospective: Added 'security' concept group with 27 terms: encrypt, decrypt, cipher, hash, salt, digest, secure, secret, key, certificate, signature, vulnerability, exploit, injection, xss, csrf, sanitize, firewall, whitelist, blacklist, allowlist, denylist, audit, scan, detect, block, filter. 100% coverage maintained.
